text: "stable adult life? more like myth imo."
adulthood used mean stability at 30 but bro we're hustling round-the-clock just tryna make ends meet - stable feels like myth these days.
adulthood's just a label anyway - more like winging it daily
honestly think slotting people into jobs because 'it fits' their gender misses out big time on unique talents - it’s like forcing lefties to write right-handed.
relationships ain’t a video game ya can’t just level up
totally agree – hard work beats fate every time!
finding 'the one' over pizza > expensive dinners any day
real love needs time n' lotsa pizza nights together
festivals are cool but local mindset really shapes ya
hometown roots? more like loose threads over here
cold winters made me love indoor gaming
